scenes.speech: The for loop is primarily used when you know exactly how many times you need to repeat a block of code. It uses a counter variable to track initialization, condition check, and increment in one line.

The while loop is used for repetition when you don't know the exact count, but you have a specific condition that must remain true for the loop to continue. It checks the condition before every iteration.
Congratulations! You now understand the basic concept of programming loops. This powerful tool is essential for automating any repetitive task in your code.
